skill.name: gh-fix-ci
skill.description: Inspect GitHub PR checks with gh, pull failing GitHub Actions logs, summarize failure context, then create a fix plan and implement after user approval. Use when a user asks to debug or fix failing PR CI/CD checks on GitHub Actions and wants a plan + code changes; for external checks (e.g., Buildkite), only report the details URL and mark them out of scope.

security_audit.summary: Prompt-based skill containing only SKILL.md metadata. References gh CLI for GitHub operations and mentions a Python script that does not exist in the package. No executable code to audit. Legitimate DevOps workflow automation.

content.user_title: Debug and fix failing GitHub CI checks
content.value_statement: Failing CI/CD checks block PR merges and waste developer time. This skill inspects failing GitHub Actions workflows, extracts error logs, and creates a fix plan for your approval before implementing changes.
actual_capabilities: Inspect failing GitHub PR checks using gh CLI
Fetch and summarize GitHub Actions workflow logs
Identify actionable failure causes with context snippets
Create fix plans using the plan skill
Implement approved fixes and suggest re-running tests
limitations: External CI providers (Buildkite, etc.) are out of scope
Requires gh CLI authentication with workflow/repo scopes
Cannot access private repos without proper permissions

use_cases.title: Debug production CI failures
use_cases.description: Quickly diagnose why production CI checks failed and get actionable fixes without manual log hunting

use_cases.title: Fix your PR CI issues
use_cases.description: Understand and resolve CI failures on your pull requests before requesting review

use_cases.title: Review CI fix proposals
use_cases.description: Get clear summaries of CI failures and approve proposed fixes before implementation

prompt_templates.title: Log-focused analysis

prompt_templates.title: Full workflow fix

faq.question: Does this skill work with GitHub Enterprise?
faq.answer: Yes, if gh CLI is configured for your Enterprise instance. Ensure proper authentication before running.

faq.question: Can it fix Buildkite or CircleCI failures?
faq.answer: No, the skill only handles GitHub Actions. External CI failures are reported with a details URL but not fixed.

faq.question: What permissions does gh need?
faq.answer: gh requires repo and workflow scopes. Run 'gh auth login' then 'gh auth status' with escalated permissions.

faq.question: Is my GitHub token stored safely?
faq.answer: Yes, the skill uses gh CLI which stores credentials securely in your system keychain.

faq.question: Why can't it access some workflow logs?
faq.answer: Logs may be expired, deleted, or require additional permissions. The skill will report missing logs explicitly.

faq.question: How does this compare to GitHub's own debugging?
faq.answer: This skill automates log retrieval and error analysis, saving time hunting through the GitHub web interface.
